text: Hey everyone, just wanted to share my thoughts on the current situation in Ukraine. It's crucial for us as conservatives to prioritize international stability, especially during times of conflict. We must stand behind our allies and send a clear message that aggression won't be tolerated. It's also essential to support a strong national defense to protect our own interests and ensure peace. Let's keep our eyes on the situation and continue to advocate for a robust foreign policy that upholds our traditional values and safeguards our freedoms. Stay informed and stay engaged! 🇺🇸
